document.full_text: the u.s. government lashed out at companies at the heart of last year's gulf oil spill on monday, denying reports it had negotiated a deal with bp to resume drilling.
document.title: u.s. says no deal with bp as it seeks to drill again
lines_and_colors: the u.s. government lashed out at companies at the heart of last year's gulf oil spill on monday, denying reports it had negotiated a deal with bp to resume drilling.
